definitions.definition: Any of various respiratory diseases in birds , especially infectious coryza . [from the 15th c.]
( humorous , dated ) Of humans, a disease , malaise or depression .

main_definition: Any of various respiratory diseases in birds , especially infectious coryza . [from the 15th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( humorous , dated ) Of humans, a disease , malaise or depression .

definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) A pippin , seed of any kind.

subdefinitions.definition: ( UK ) A seed inside certain fleshy fruits, such as the stone ( pit ) of a stonefruit or the smaller seeds of an orange or apple .
examples: Apple pips are edible, but don't have a pleasant taste.

definitions.definition: ( US , colloquial ) Something or someone excellent , of high quality.
( British , dated , World War I , signalese ) P in RAF phonetic alphabet .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A pippin , seed of any kind.
secondary_definitions: ( US , colloquial ) Something or someone excellent , of high quality.
( British , dated , World War I , signalese ) P in RAF phonetic alphabet .

definitions.definition: One of the spots or symbols on a playing card , domino , die , etc.
( military , public service ) One of the stylised version of the Bath star worn on the shoulder of a uniform to denote rank, e.g. of a soldier or a fireman .
A spot of light or an inverted V indicative of a return of radar waves reflected from an object; a blip .
A piece of rhizome with a dormant shoot of the lily of the valley plant, used for propagation

main_definition: One of the spots or symbols on a playing card , domino , die , etc.
secondary_definitions: ( military , public service ) One of the stylised version of the Bath star worn on the shoulder of a uniform to denote rank, e.g. of a soldier or a fireman .
A spot of light or an inverted V indicative of a return of radar waves reflected from an object; a blip .
A piece of rhizome with a dormant shoot of the lily of the valley plant, used for propagation

definitions.definition: One of a series of very short, electronically produced tones , used, for example, to count down the final few seconds before a given time or to indicate that a caller using a payphone needs to make further payment to continue the call.

main_definition: One of a series of very short, electronically produced tones , used, for example, to count down the final few seconds before a given time or to indicate that a caller using a payphone needs to make further payment to continue the call.

definitions.definition: The smallest price increment between two currencies in foreign exchange ( forex ) trading .

main_definition: ( finance , currency trading ) The smallest price increment between two currencies in foreign exchange ( forex ) trading .
